data.oai_dc:dc: Fig3B.xls provides the raw data used in Figure 3 B. Data are presented into two excel sheets: "P.axillaris" and "Hybrids". All data were obtained either in Minas, Uruguay, or in Rivera, Uruguay.These data sheets show the number of visitations of "small bees", "big bees", "diurnal butterflies" and hawkmoths on P. axillaris and F1 hybrids during day (8h-12h) and night (21h-23h) periods. Behaviours are devided into "Approaches", "Landings" and "Feedings".
